review: I had earlier  experience with two eminent dentists but Dr Sayak Gupta has an immaculate way of care and treatment.  He follows up to know if there has been any problem. I would recommend all to visit Dr  Gupta's most sophisticated and advanced clinic for quality  care.

It was my 1st dental issue in my life and I was too scared and uncomfortable but Dr Sayak Gupta by his compassionate behaviour made everything smooth ….I would highly recommend him for anyone who’s suffering from dental pro and need treatment

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have always been paranoid of dental treatments until I had an absolutely painless and professional wisdom tooth extraction here . Dr Sayak is highly skilled and knowledgeable and pretty compassionate too . The clinic has a positive and hygienic ambience with a very efficient lady at the reception. I am very happy with the results, highly recommended.

I have been suffering for a long time with my oral problem.
Visited a number of doctors but my problems largely remained unsolved until i undertook treatment from Dr Gupta. His skill in root canal treatment is unparallel and his chamber is equipped with all modern devices. 
I strongly recommend Dr Sayak Gupta for any dental issues.
Its 4th time to cure my dental problem...and I am happy to visit the new clinic.Thank you Dr Sayak..
